page.title: 03Family Life at the Weekend
page.content: At the weekend there isn't any school, but mum goes to work at about 12.00 as she makes meals at the White Horse which is one of many pubs in the village. My sister Claire and I have to take it in turns to make the dinner and do the washing up when mum is at work. Robert, my brother, always moans because he doesn't like the food we make especially when his girlfriend, Shirley, comes round. Dad spends a lot of time at the weekend working on his computer in the study, but he also gives all the family lessons in computing. Martin, my older brother, spends most of his time playing around with his car. On Sundays we take the dog round the fields for a walk and afterwards I have to clean the inside of the car.
